# [Interview #50: LOC Signing Report - Judy Ghirardelli, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=50#2)

#### Judy Ghirardelli

Would you speculate about how old Verin is, other than very old?

#### Robert Jordan

No.
